The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.ARABIC_TEXT: قَالَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم: ((مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَيَّ صَلاَةً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ بِهَا عَشْراً)).
The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (The Prophet (PBUH) said: ‘Whoever sends a prayer upon me, Allah sends ten upon him.)

The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَالَ صلى الله عليه وسلم: ((لاَ تَجْعَلُوا قَبْرِي عِيداً وَصَلُّوا عَلَيَّ؛ فَإِنَّ صَلاَتَكُم تَبْلُغُنِي حَيْثُ كُنْتُمْ)).
The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (He (PBUH) also said: ‘Do not take my grave as a place of habitual ceremony.  Send prayers upon me, for verily your prayers reach me wherever you are.)

The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَالَ صلى الله عليه وسلم: ((الْبَخِيلُ مَنْ ذُكِرْتُ عِنْدَهُ فَلَمْ يُصَلِّ عَلَيَّ)).
The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (He (PBUH) also said: ‘A miser is one whom when I am mentioned to him,  fails to send prayers upon me.)

The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَالَ صلى الله عليه وسلم:((إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَلاَئِكَةً سَيَّاحِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يُبَلِّغُونِي مِنْ أُمَّتِي السَّلاَمَ)).
The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.TRANSLATED_TEXT: The Prophet [PBUH] said:'Indeed Allah has angels who roam the earth and they convey to me the greetings (or prayers of peace) of my 'Ummah (nation).

The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.ARABIC_TEXT: وَقَالَ صلى الله عليه وسلم: ((مَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ يُسَلِّمُ عَلَيَّ إِلاَّ رَدَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيَّ رُوحِيَ حَتَّى أَرُدَّ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمَ)).
The excellence of asking for Allah's ble.TRANSLATED_TEXT: The Prophet [PBUH] said: 'No one sends greetings (or prayers of peace) upon me but Allah returns my soul to me so that I may return his greetings
